Subskills.name: Spot On
Subskills.description: Increases attack rating when using arrow rain.

Subskills.name: Long Reach
Subskills.description: Increased the range of arrow rain.

Subskills.name: Scorching Volley
Subskills.description: Raining arrows are now on fire dealing fire damage instead and lowering monster fire resistances on hit.

Subskills.name: Rain Of Pain
Subskills.description: Increases the amount of arrow rain projectiles.

Subskills.name: Coverage
Subskills.description: Increases the area of effect radius of arrow rain.

Subskills.name: Sharper Tips
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by arrow rain.

Subskills.name: Split Fall
Subskills.description: Chance on hit for arrows to split into multiple projectiles flying in all directions.

Subskills.name: My Territory
Subskills.description: Decreases the movement diminish when using arrow rain.

Subskills.name: Arrow Splinter
Subskills.description: When hitting the ground arrows split into multiple piercing arrows flying in all directions.

Subskills.name: Cutting Arrows
Subskills.description: Chance to inflict bleed on hit.

Subskills.name: Wound Salt
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt to bleeding targets.

Subskills.name: Maiming Arrow
Subskills.description: Chance to stun target on hit.

Subskills.name: Kill Command
Subskills.description: Unleash a long rain of arrows on a massive radius. Arrow rain now has a cooldown.

Subskills.name: Contract Killer
Subskills.description: Decreases the radius of arrow rain significantly dealing increased damage.
